fullText: May I ask what happened to justice for all? I have some pretty damn good employment law cases and not a single attorney in Iowa has the resources to take it on. Is there an attorney out there that can at least coach me so I can move forward Pro Se?

user.name: Demolition Man
user.description: I was born with the gift of being an artist by God and use the talents to paint, weld fabricate, sculpt and make people happy.

fullText: I wrote a song about a girl that kissed me one night and was dead the next morning. I never wanted to write about it or tell anyone about it because it was a painful part of what broke me. It is a story I needed to tell so I could let it fly in the wind instead of leaving it
Question the quietness of the cosmos
